resources.string: Use mouse or finger to scroll side to side

The game rules are similar to regular Sudoku. The difference is that instead of numbers, You will be using English and Spanish words. 
In the default setting, English words will be given and you will choose from 9 given Spanish words so that every row, column, and 3x3 region contains each word exactly once.
In other words, if 'One' is already in row 2, column 8, 'Uno' can't go in row 2, column 8, or the top right region. When you click on a cell, the highlighted cells will tell you what words shouldn't be used. 
 
This is an example of the game board you will see when you begin the game with the default settings. 
Correct selections will be shown as blue, and incorrect selections will be shown as red.
You can cheat by tapping the 'SOLVE' button to end the game and go back to the main menu to start a new game.

This is manual input mode, you will select a cell and manually input the answer into the text field, then click OK to confirm. similarly, when you click on a cell, the highlighted cells will tell you what words shouldn\'t be used.

This is audio mode, it can be used in combination with other settings. This mode will change the given words to numbers. You will need to click on the numbers, listen for the word spoken, and choose the correct translation of the word from the pop-up. Using the words you filled in by listening, you will be able to do the puzzle like normal.
